price: 52. (Recuerda, ¡oh, Muhammad!) cuando Abraham preguntó a su padre y a su pueblo: “¿Qué son esas estatuas que adoran?”.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā hādhihi al-tamāthīlu allatī antum lahā ʿākifūna
